content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage System at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden chest (41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter (41.5, -79.5) moving items from drill to chest

### Iron Production Line at position(-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (-28.0, -61.0)
- Wooden chest (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace (-25.0, -59.0)
- Burner inserter (-23.5, -58.5)
- Storage chest (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron and copper plates

### Secondary Iron Production Line at position(-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (-18.0, -53.0)
- Wooden chest (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace (-15.0, -51.0)
- Burner inserter (-13.5, -50.5)
- Storage chest (-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates

### Power Generation System at position(-4.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler (-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected pipe networks for water and steam distribution
- Electricity network connecting multiple entities

### Science Pack Production Line
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (8.5, 13.5) for automation science packs
- Input chest (5.5, 13.5)
- Output chest (11.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserters (6.5, 13.5 and 10.5, 13.5) for material movement
- Lab for research
- Connected belt systems for material transport

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to extract non-existent items
- Verify item existence in chest before attempting extraction
- Check if the production line is actually producing items before trying to collect them

### Errors with technology research
- Check if technology is already researched before attempting to research it again
- Verify prerequisites are met before setting new research

### Errors with resource shortages
- Ensure all required ingredients are available before starting production
- Monitor and maintain fuel levels in burner entities
- Keep input chests stocked with required materials

### Production line efficiency issues
- Monitor assembling machine status for ingredient shortages
- Ensure consistent supply of both iron gear wheels and copper plates
- Keep fuel levels adequate in all burner inserters and mining drills
